name: Ballistic HC Apple iPhone 4/4s Hard Core Case with Holster

reviews.name: Ballistic HC Apple iPhone 4/4s Hard Core Case with Holster
reviews.reviewText: It turns the other wise dorky looking Iphone 4 into something that looks so rugged and manly that it belongs in the military. I only hope that I never have to find out how tough it is the hard way and Its alot more affordable than the otter box.
reviews.title: A batsuit for your phone!

reviews.name: Ballistic HC Apple iPhone 4/4s Hard Core Case with Holster
reviews.reviewText: This is the second case I have had with two of my 4s's. It protected beyond all my expectations for the full life of my first phone. This new one is just as good. They didn't hae it in white this time, but the hot pink is ok. Protects well from occasional splashes and spills. If I had any complaint, it is just that an occasional piece of lint gets under the screen protector somehow, but not a hard fix. Superb protection, well worth the cost.
reviews.title: Truly, one of the best I've had...

reviews.name: Ballistic HC Apple iPhone 4/4s Hard Core Case with Holster
reviews.title: ballistic
